articles.content: On paper Pete Alonso had a tough day at the plate stranding runners left and right but he did just enough to power the Mets to a 5-3 victory over the Marlins. Alonso opened the scoring in the second … [+1913 chars]

articles.title: Layden Blocker, No. 28 recruit in 2023 ESPN 100 college basketball rankings, commits to Arkansas Razorbacks - ESPN
articles.description: Layden Blocker, the No. 28 recruit -- and seventh-ranked point guard -- in the ESPN 100 for 2023, has committed to Arkansas, who had the No. 2 recruiting class in 2022.
articles.content:
Guard Layden Blocker, the No. 28 recruit in the ESPN 100 for 2023, on Saturday announced his commitment to Arkansas, becoming the Razorbacks' first commitment in the class.

articles.content:
